parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post contains a CMF number (11240002), which is a strong indicator of electoral propaganda, as it's a mandatory identifier for campaign materials in Romania.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly refers to Alina Gorghiu, a candidate for the parliamentary elections, and promotes the PNL party.  This directly satisfies "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, the content is clearly intended to reach a wide audience, not just a select few. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The post's primary objective is to encourage voters to support Alina Gorghiu and the PNL party in the upcoming parliamentary elections. The phrase "Duminică, votați echipa PNL!" ("Sunday, vote for the PNL team!") explicitly aims to influence voting behavior. This satisfies "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic content. It lacks objective reporting, analysis, or diverse perspectives. Instead, it focuses solely on promoting a specific candidate and party.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a direct appeal for votes, presented as a campaign message.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>561393536849758</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to a specific candidate (Alina Gorghiu), is used during the electoral campaign period (as indicated by the presence of a CMF number and the call to vote), has a clear electoral objective (influencing votes for PNL), and is disseminated to a wide audience via a paid Facebook advertisement.  The presence of the CMF number is particularly damning, as it is a legal requirement for campaign materials. There are no counterarguments to suggest this is not electoral propaganda.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>Alina Gorghiu</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PNL</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
[Entitatea responsabilă de postare], pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promovează candidata Alina Gorghiu și Partidul Național Liberal (PNL) pentru alegerile parlamentare, cu textul explicit „Duminică, votați echipa PNL!”, având ca efect electoral influențarea voturilor în favoarea PNL, fapt demonstrat prin prezența codului CMF: 11240002, obligatoriu pentru materialele de campanie electorală, și prin natura reclamei plătite, adresată unui public larg.  ID-ul postării pe Facebook este 561393536849758.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
